message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'd be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $180. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me there?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. $120 is my minimum, but I'm willing to come down a bit to $150.  This reflects the value of the product and would allow me to make this deal worthwhile.  What do you think?
I appreciate the willingness to come down to $150, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Can you meet me there?
